column4: hi, i have an old canon powershot A40, whose folders i want to browse.  however, when i connect the camera and turn it on, there is merely a message displayed that gives me the choice to import photos.  the camera doesn't even show up in nautilus.  how do i get it to do that?
: it shows up as a camera, but not as a folder
: that's not my goal.  i need to ultimately be able to format the card in the camera.  it doesn't seem to be mounted, or bound to any /dev device
